text: 3:13 Godɨn Araziba 21:23; Rom 8:3; 2 Korin 5:21; Galesia 4:5Moses Osirizir Araziba kamaghɨn mɨkeme, e gumazamiziba bar Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangɨva, egh ikuvigham. Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨkeme, “Gumazir ter ighuvimɨn duiba God ghaze, me gumazir kuraba.” Ezɨ kamaghɨn Krais en akurvaghasa ziar kam ini, “gumazir kuram.” Egha ziar kam bangɨn a uam e ini.
